data.title: Bragg Gaming CEO Sells Block of Shares Under Blackout Waiver
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Bragg Gaming Group Inc ( (TSE:BRAG) ) has issued an update.

On February 26, 2026, Bragg Gaming Group’s board approved a limited waiver of its trading blackout to allow CEO Matevž Mazij to execute a privately negotiated block sale of 1,039,000 common shares to a single buyer. The waiver was granted to address Mazij’s urgent personal financial needs, with the board noting that the company had already released preliminary unaudited 2025 results and determining he did not hold material non-public financial information.

The sale, conducted via Mazij’s holding company K.A.V.O. Holdings Limited at C$2.00 per share for gross proceeds of C$2,078,000, reduced his direct and indirect stake from 17.70% to 13.55% of Bragg’s outstanding shares. The purchaser agreed to a six-month lock-up and a non-disclosure agreement, and while Bragg does not expect further blackout waivers, the CEO may still adjust his holdings over time depending on market conditions and investment considerations.

The most recent analyst rating on (TSE:BRAG) stock is a Buy with a C$7.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Bragg Gaming Group Inc stock, see the TSE:BRAG Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on TSE:BRAG Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, TSE:BRAG is a Neutral.

Bragg Gaming Group’s overall score is primarily influenced by strong revenue growth and strategic expansion efforts. However, profitability challenges and a negative valuation score weigh heavily on the stock’s attractiveness. Technical indicators suggest a bearish trend, while recent corporate events and positive earnings call sentiment provide some optimism.

To see Spark’s full report on TSE:BRAG stock, click here.

More about Bragg Gaming Group Inc

Bragg Gaming Group Inc. is a Toronto-based iGaming content and platform technology provider serving online and land-based gaming operators globally. The company offers proprietary and exclusive casino game content via Bragg Studios and partner studios, delivered through its remote games server and Bragg HUB platform, and supports operators with modular player account management technology, data tools and engagement solutions across more than 30 regulated markets in North America, Latin America and Europe.

Average Trading Volume: 13,594

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: C$56.75M

For a thorough assessment of BRAG stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Mare Group Hit by Court Order Blocking Voting Rights in Eles Meeting
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Mare Engineering Group SpA ( (IT:MARE) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Mare Group has received a precautionary court order from the Court of Perugia, obtained by EbidCo S.r.l., temporarily prohibiting the company from exercising voting rights attached to 1,000,000 Eles Semiconductor Equipment S.p.A. shares, equal to about 4.98% of Eles’s capital, at the Eles shareholders’ meeting scheduled for 2–3 March 2026. Mare Group deems EbidCo’s claims unfounded and instrumental, signaling it intends to take all appropriate actions to defend its position, an indication of rising legal and governance tensions around its stake in Eles that could influence its role and influence in the semiconductor equipment company’s upcoming corporate decisions.

More about Mare Engineering Group SpA

Mare Group S.p.A. is an Italian high-tech engineering hub focused on strategic sectors including aerospace and defense, industry, critical infrastructure and the twin transition, serving more than 2,000 clients in Italy and abroad. Listed on Euronext Growth Milan, it operates an asset-light model based on proprietary platforms, with over 700 employees across 32 offices in five countries and has executed 19 acquisitions since 2019, positioning itself as a major innovation aggregator in Italy and Europe.

Average Trading Volume: 16,322

Technical Sentiment Signal: Sell

Current Market Cap: €67.81M

See more insights into MARE stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Morgan Stanley Discloses 4.25% Voting Stake in Siemens Energy
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Siemens Energy ( (DE:ENR) ) has issued an announcement.

Siemens Energy disclosed a voting rights announcement stating that Morgan Stanley has crossed a regulatory threshold in its shareholding. Due to the end of applicability of a custody exemption under German securities law, Morgan Stanley now holds 3.07% of Siemens Energy’s voting rights via shares and a further 1.18% via financial instruments, for a total of 4.25% as of 20 February 2026.

The position reflects a slight decrease from a previously reported combined 4.63%, driven by a reduction in voting rights held through derivative instruments. The notification highlights ongoing institutional investor activity in Siemens Energy’s stock and provides transparency on complex equity and derivative exposures, information closely watched by shareholders and market participants under Germany’s disclosure regime.

The most recent analyst rating on (DE:ENR) stock is a Buy with a EUR200.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Siemens Energy stock, see the DE:ENR Stock Forecast page.

More about Siemens Energy

Siemens Energy AG is a Germany-based energy technology company focused on power generation and transmission equipment and services. The group supplies products such as gas and steam turbines, grid technologies, and related solutions to utilities and industrial customers, with its shares listed on the regulated market in Frankfurt and several other German exchanges.

Average Trading Volume: 2,111,562

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: €141.4B

For an in-depth examination of ENR stock, go to TipRanks’ Overview page.

data.title: Fitness Champs Holdings Sets March 20, 2026 Extraordinary General Meeting
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Fitness Champs Holdings Limited ( (FCHL) ) has shared an update.

Fitness Champs Holdings Limited, a Singapore-based aquatic sports education provider and major SwimSafer contractor for public school children, offers a mix of general swimming, ladies-only classes and aquatic sports training for all ages, while positioning itself to diversify into other sports. The company announced on February 27, 2026 that it will hold an Extraordinary General Meeting of shareholders in Singapore on March 20, 2026, with holders of its Class A and Class B ordinary shares as of February 24, 2026 entitled to vote, a step that signals upcoming shareholder decisions that could shape its strategic direction and governance.

The EGM will take place at the company’s Ang Mo Kio headquarters at 10 a.m. Singapore time on March 20, 2026, corresponding to 9 p.m. Eastern Standard Time on March 19, 2026, allowing international investors to follow proceedings across time zones. Notice of the meeting, the proxy statement and proxy card have been made available through the company’s investor relations website and the SEC’s online system, underscoring Fitness Champs’ efforts to engage its shareholder base and maintain regulatory transparency as it pursues growth in the sports education market.

The most recent analyst rating on (FCHL) stock is a Sell with a $0.25 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Fitness Champs Holdings Limited stock, see the FCHL Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on FCHL Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, FCHL is a Underperform.

The score is primarily pressured by weak financial performance quality (margin deterioration, weakened cash generation, and a sharply higher leverage profile with very thin equity). Technicals add further caution with negative momentum and a broader downtrend. Valuation offers limited support due to a negative P/E and no dividend yield.

To see Spark’s full report on FCHL stock, click here.

More about Fitness Champs Holdings Limited

Fitness Champs Holdings Limited is a Singapore-based aquatic sports education provider offering general swimming lessons for children and adults, including ladies-only classes and aquatic sports such as water polo, competitive swimming and lifesaving. It ranks among the largest providers of swimming lessons to children in Singapore’s public schools under the Ministry of Education’s SwimSafer program and has run private lessons under its “Fitness Champs” brand since 2012, with ambitions to expand into broader sports education such as pickleball.

Average Trading Volume: 315,294

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Sell

Current Market Cap: $3.9M

Learn more about FCHL stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Interoil boosts revenue on higher gas prices as it exits conventional Argentine operations
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

InterOil Exploration and Production ASA ( (DE:1ZD0) ) has shared an update.

Interoil reported total operated production of 312,937 barrels of oil equivalent for the six-month period, down from 346,001 boe a year earlier, as Argentine operations were disrupted by harsh winter conditions and equipment failures. Despite lower output, higher gas prices in Argentina lifted revenue to USD 9.9 million from USD 6.1 million, while a dispute over the Mata Magallanes Oeste and Cañadón Ramírez joint venture led Petrominera S.E. to terminate the agreement, prompting the company to assess ways to safeguard its contractual rights.

To reinforce its balance sheet, bondholders approved changes to Interoil’s senior secured callable bonds, including payment-in-kind interest, a one-year maturity extension, eased reporting covenants, and consent to sell certain Argentine assets as part of a broader liquidity management effort. The company has since executed a strategic exit from its conventional Argentine operations, selling its stakes in the Santa Cruz Sur joint operations and the La Brea Block, alongside related rights in MMO and CR, to a local investor for up to USD 1.0 million in contingent payments plus an 80% overriding royalty on profits above defined production thresholds, reshaping its exposure to the Argentine market.

More about InterOil Exploration and Production ASA

Interoil Exploration and Production ASA is a Norwegian-based independent oil and gas exploration and production company listed on the Oslo Stock Exchange under the ticker IOX. The company has focused on Latin America for over two decades, leveraging technical expertise and a disciplined approach to value creation and sustainability in upstream hydrocarbon operations.

Average Trading Volume: 101,723

Current Market Cap: NOK20.9M

Nutrien Ltd. said on February 27, 2026 that it has filed its 2025 Annual Report, including Management’s Discussion and Analysis, audited consolidated financial statements and Annual Information Form, on U.S. and Canadian securities regulators’ websites, with the documents also accessible via the company’s investor relations portal. The company simultaneously published its 2025 Sustainability Report, providing investors and other stakeholders with updated insight into its strategy, market environment, governance, risk profile, financial performance and sustainability initiatives, which together offer a comprehensive view of Nutrien’s recent operating and ESG performance.

The most recent analyst rating on (TSE:NTR) stock is a Buy with a C$78.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Nutrien stock, see the TSE:NTR Stock Forecast page.

Earnings call was net-positive on execution and capital allocation, tempered by operational and regional risks (Brazil, Trinidad-related nitrogen volumes, working-capital and phosphate pressure).

To see Spark’s full report on TSE:NTR stock, click here.

The company focuses on long-term value creation across the agricultural value chain by investing in its operational advantages and maintaining strong access to resources and key stakeholder relationships.

data.title: Presurance Completes Rights Offering and Redeems Preferred Stock
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Presurance Holdings ( (PRHI) ) has provided an announcement.

On February 27, 2026, Presurance Holdings entered into a redemption agreement with Clarkston Companies to repurchase and cancel all of its Series B preferred stock for an aggregate redemption price of $7.5 million, including accrued dividends. A portion of the redemption price equal to the original issue value was offset against amounts owed by Clarkston under a backstop agreement related to Presurance’s rights offering.

Also on February 27, 2026, Presurance closed its previously announced rights offering, which expired on February 24, 2026, with subscribers purchasing 4,284,640 common shares for approximately $4.3 million in gross proceeds. Together with 9,715,360 unsubscribed shares purchased by Clarkston and its assignee under the backstop commitment, the company raised a total of $14 million in gross proceeds, which it used to redeem the Series B preferred stock and for general corporate purposes, simplifying its capital structure and bolstering liquidity.

The most recent analyst rating on (PRHI) stock is a Hold with a $0.76 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Presurance Holdings stock, see the PRHI Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on PRHI Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, PRHI is a Neutral.

The score is pressured primarily by weak financial performance (TTM losses, contracting revenue, and significant cash burn). Technicals also reflect a persistent downtrend with negative momentum. Balance-sheet improvement (zero debt and higher equity versus 2023) provides some support but is outweighed by ongoing operating and cash-flow weakness.

To see Spark’s full report on PRHI stock, click here.

More about Presurance Holdings

Presurance Holdings, Inc. is a Michigan-based property and casualty insurance holding company that, through its subsidiaries, provides specialty insurance coverage. The company focuses on disciplined growth and long-term value creation and is listed on the Nasdaq Capital Market under the ticker symbol PRHI.

Average Trading Volume: 70,027

Technical Sentiment Signal: Strong Sell

Current Market Cap: $8.76M

See more insights into PRHI stock on TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Reti lifts 2025 revenue and profit, proposes higher payout amid tech-sector push
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Reti SpA ( (IT:RETI) ) has issued an announcement.

Reti S.p.A. closed 2025 with a 10.3% rise in value of production to €35.62 million, driven by its core IT solutions business and expanded client portfolio, while net profit increased 14.1% to €1.44 million despite a lower EBITDA margin amid higher personnel investment to attract and retain talent. The board approved the 2025 financial statements and impact report, proposed a €0.06 per-share dividend with a payout ratio above 50%, outlined continued efforts to strengthen financial solidity and innovation, and called a shareholders’ meeting that will also vote on renewing authorization for share buybacks and appointed the supervisory body for 2026.

Net financial debt edged up to €3.92 million, though leverage linked to the technological campus decreased and cash rose to €1.61 million, reflecting disciplined capital management alongside ongoing development projects. The company, which holds about 2.45% of its share capital as treasury shares, highlighted its strategic role as a long-term transformation partner in a rapidly evolving tech landscape marked by cloud, generative AI and cyber security, signalling confidence in the resilience of its business model after the passing of its founder.

More about Reti SpA

Reti S.p.A., listed on Euronext Growth Milan, is one of the main Italian players in IT consulting, with a focus on system integration, IT solutions and managed services. The società benefit serves a growing national and international client base, positioning itself as a partner for digital transformation, cloud adoption, data-driven strategies and cyber security.

Average Trading Volume: 16,562

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: €22.25M

For a thorough assessment of RETI stock, go to TipRanks’ Stock Analysis page.

data.title: Clearfield Shareholders Back Board, Executive Pay and Auditor
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Clearfield ( (CLFD) ) has shared an update.

On February 26, 2026, Clearfield held its 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders, with approximately 73% of outstanding common shares represented, reflecting solid investor participation in the company’s governance process. Shareholders elected eight directors to serve until the next annual meeting, maintaining continuity in board leadership and strategic oversight.

Investors also approved, on a non-binding advisory basis, the compensation program for Clearfield’s named executive officers, signaling support for the company’s pay practices and leadership. In addition, shareholders ratified Deloitte & Touche LLP as Clearfield’s independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, reinforcing confidence in the company’s financial reporting and audit framework.

The most recent analyst rating on (CLFD) stock is a Hold with a $34.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Clearfield stock, see the CLFD Stock Forecast page.

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, CLFD is a Neutral.

The score is primarily held back by weak TTM financial performance (sharp revenue decline and net losses) and only neutral technical momentum. Offsetting supports include a strong, low-debt balance sheet with positive free cash flow and a generally positive earnings update (revenue beat, margin improvement, reiterated full-year guidance, and ongoing buybacks).

To see Spark’s full report on CLFD stock, click here.

More about Clearfield

Clearfield operates in the communications and networking equipment industry, providing fiber management and connectivity products that support broadband and fiber-to-the-premises deployments for network operators and service providers. The company focuses on enabling efficient, scalable fiber infrastructure for telecommunications carriers, wireless operators and broadband network builders in competitive and regulated markets.

data.title: Central Asia Metals Updates Total Voting Rights and Share Capital
data.description:
Claim 50% Off TipRanks Premium

  • Unlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions
  • Stay ahead of the market with the latest news and analysis and maximize your portfolio's potential

Central Asia Metals ( (GB:CAML) ) has provided an announcement.

Central Asia Metals has reported that, as of 27 February 2026, its issued share capital stands at 178,006,319 ordinary shares, of which 193,325 are held in treasury. This leaves a total of 177,812,994 voting rights in the company, a key figure for investors assessing whether they must disclose holdings or changes under UK transparency rules.

The announcement clarifies the current capital and voting structure, providing an updated denominator for regulatory disclosure calculations required by the FCA’s Disclosure Guidance and Transparency regime. This routine disclosure supports market transparency and allows shareholders and potential investors to better track their notifiable interests in the AIM-quoted miner.

The most recent analyst rating on (GB:CAML) stock is a Buy with a £251.00 price target. To see the full list of analyst forecasts on Central Asia Metals stock, see the GB:CAML Stock Forecast page.

Spark’s Take on GB:CAML Stock

According to Spark, TipRanks’ AI Analyst, GB:CAML is a Outperform.

The score is driven primarily by strong financial fundamentals (high margins, low leverage, solid cash generation). Valuation is supportive with a moderate P/E and high dividend yield, while the earnings call reinforced returns and operational progress but flagged Sasa cost/grade challenges. Technicals are constructive on trend but tempered by overbought signals that raise near-term volatility risk.

To see Spark’s full report on GB:CAML stock, click here.

More about Central Asia Metals

Central Asia Metals is an AIM-quoted UK-based resources company focused on base metals production and exploration. It owns 100% of the Kounrad SX-EW copper operation in Kazakhstan and the Sasa zinc-lead mine in North Macedonia, along with an 80% stake in CAML Exploration in Kazakhstan and a 32.6% interest in Aberdeen Minerals in northeast Scotland.

Average Trading Volume: 957,349

Technical Sentiment Signal: Buy

Current Market Cap: £400M
